Name: Creole Cosmo
Ingredients: 40 ml Rhum Clément Créole Shrubb liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lime zest twist.
Express lime zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Dry tangy and perhaps more sophisticated than a classic Cosmo .
History: Cosmopolitan cocktail history and recipe variations
Nutrition: One serving of Creole Cosmo contains 158 calories
